detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit cotton with a small embroidered appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in viscose twill with embroidery at the top and buttons down the back. Short sleeves with a scalloped frill trim, a gathered seam at the top and flared skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a soft weave with a V-neck, wide shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and long, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped sparkly stone button at the top.
Low-waisted trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shorter, double-knitted jumper in a soft wool blend with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Pull-on trousers in soft twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, fake flap leg pockets, and elasticated hems.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood, high collar, and zip and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Leggings in crushed velvet with an elasticated waist.
Pleated top in patterned jersey with a round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Leather boots with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings, leather insoles and chunky soles.
Shorts in woven fabric with hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly and side pockets. High waist with pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight, cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft jersey. Gently flared top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. Stretchy hairband with a knot detail at the front.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from recycled polyester and cotton. Elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets, leg pockets with a taped zip, and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a slight sheen. Round neckline with a small opening and twisted detail at the front, long sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Headband in a soft knit with a knot detail at the front.
Calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a concealed zip in one side and high slit at the front. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat in a soft, fluffy, rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and drawstring hood with a ribbed trim. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless tunic in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, inset lace trims at the top, a seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front, an adjustable tab and metal buckle at the top and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and button at the back, a high waist with pleats all round, and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar and French front. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Wide dress in an airy weave with a small collar and opening at the front with ties at the top. Long balloon sleeves with pleats and a button at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Metal rings in various designs.
Top in washed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a round pendant.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and elbow-length sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, pointelle-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Metal hair clips in various sizes and designs. Length from 6 cm to 6.5 cm.
Cotton trainers with a decorative bow at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cropped off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit with wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
All-in-one suit in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with raglan sleeves and ribbed trims. Buttons along one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with a square neckline, buttons down the front and flutter sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a button placket. One in pointelle.

Trainers with details in imitation leather and mesh, a padded top edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Padded tongue and lacing with reflective details. Piqué linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a sturdy weave with a silicone trim at the top, side support and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and wide, straight legs with creases.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, padded hood. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a draped front, sewn-in ties at one side and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gently flared lower section.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.

Sunglasses with plastic frames and sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective, plastic, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and a V-neck with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with a high waist with concealed elastication and slim, extra-long legs with a concealed zip at the hems.

Trousers woven in a wool blend with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pockets in the side seams, a welt back pocket and straight, wide legs with creases and visible seams at the back.
Caps in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
